name: The Contemporary Hub
description:
IC Contemporary is proud to announce our newest upcoming project: The Contemporary Hub!

Here you can visit various Artists of the Month features and have access to every ICC exhibition, including Queer Identities, Looking Back, Somnarium, and Intersection. We’ll also be hosting digital platforms for other galleries and artists!

Even more exciting news, this platform is MULTIPLAYER! You’ll be able to connect with friends, family, and other art enthusiasts from around the world.

Although we’re in the early stages of the app, we’re going to be actively seeking support from our community members to test out this vast new space. If you want to be one of our beta-testers, please join our discord to leave some feedback for us and to engage with our community (https://discord.gg/2FbHHs4d)
